### Anylink version used?

<pre>
./anylink tool -v

</pre>


### What type and version of operating system are you using?
Such as: centos 7.9
<pre>
cat /etc/issue
cat /etc/redhat-release
</pre>

### Which linux kernel version to use?
<pre>
uname -a
</pre>
